Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Avalon
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Avalon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Avalon.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Indiana
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Indiana due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Indiana due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
